website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight, comfortable ice cleats that are suitable for walking and running in slippery winter conditions.
pros: Cleats easily slip on and over footwear
Stay-on toe caps keep them securely in place
Reflective heels improve visibility after dark
Made of durable rubber that won’t snap or crack in cold temperatures
cons: Some users report that the spikes fall off fairly easily

customer_reviews.title: Grips Ice Well
customer_reviews.text: Actual gripping "spikes" are about the size of a spark plug electrode and very sharp. They definitely bite into the ice and frozen, packed snow. I ordered the XL size (men's 9-13), but I had to really stretch them to get over a men's size 10 Sorel snow boot. They just stretched far enough to get the rear spikes properly under the heel where my weight presses down. With a larger snow boot size it could be a challenge to position the spikes. Would buy again, though knowing the size restrictions. Remember not to walk on wood or recycled plastic decking as the spikes will scratch them.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: They Work... I think
customer_reviews.text: I got these so that I wouldn't bust my tailbone on the way to class. AND IT NEVER BECAME ICY THE REST OF THE YEAR AFTER I GOT THEM!!! I'm going to have to go to an ice rink to see if they really work. I can tell you they definitely make me sound like a tap dancer when I wear them inside and scratch up my parents' wooden floors, but the jury is still out on ice.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gregory Keown

customer_reviews.title: Great urban winter solution
customer_reviews.text: My family used these on a trip to Oslo, Norway where they use small gravel on the ice instead of salt as they do where we live. These grips worked great on walking paths as the temperature hovered around freezing thus substantial melting and refreezing was occurring. Others were constantly slipping but we had great traction on the snow and ice covered walkways.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The rubber snapped as soon as my husband tried to put them on his shoes. The company replaced them very quickly so we'll see how these preform.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a similar pair of ice cleats that wore out. These were less expensive but seem very well made. They fit tight and do what they are supposed to do- keep you from slipping on ice. I have only worn them for a few miles but so far they are wearing well. Good product at this price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fleiner

customer_reviews.title: OK...So far!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and appears to be fairly well made. They go on over my boots quite well, much easier than my previous grips from a competitor. The reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that I have yet to use them in real conditions. I wish the studs were longer. I fear that even a little snow will not allow the studs to bite into the ice as they need to to provide a good degree of safety. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: short stringer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on an off, effective on ice
customer_reviews.text: I have these for use in the car with icy parking lots, of which we have a good number in the winter. Regular Yaktrax are too cumbersome to put on each time you want to get out of the car and these address that. I have only used them once, but they did well on icy areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson W. Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Safer Winter Walking Option
customer_reviews.text: Having to walk a dog in often snowy/icy conditions with a painful recently broken wrist, the ICETRAX are a safety necessity for me and I can now walk more confidently in bad winter conditions. Also recovering from a broken knee cap a few months ago, it is very important that I do all I can to prevent another fall and the ICETRAX provide that extra safety feature.
customer_reviews.author: 57slg

customer_reviews.title: Ice Cleats work great.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Snug on your foot, wich gives you a secure feeling, that they won't fall off. Superior texture due to it's thicker rubber material.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Other brands just don’t cut it
customer_reviews.text: The ICETRAX Pro Winter Ice Grips for Shoes and Boots fits and stays securely on both my hiking boots and shoes. I walk about 50 miles a week. We’ve had some frigid weather in Minneapolis these past few months followed by warmer times of melting. I have tried two other brands this winter and they either wore out and broke or they would not stay affixed to my shoes. I’m glad I finally found a product that I can rely on. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and sturdy. I like how I could walk on ice but then there are patches of concrete so I worried I’d wear them down. Will wear on days wear ice covers everything
customer_reviews.author: L. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a more secure fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my previous pair didn't stay on flexible soled trail shoes. These do a much better job. They do not keep your feet warm, but they do keep you upright...
customer_reviews.author: Keith Boniface

customer_reviews.title: Walk safely on icy pavement
customer_reviews.text: Very good grips on them for walking on icy sidewalks, driveways, and roads. A must for walking safely outside in the north country in winter, especially in walking the dog or to work or school also.
customer_reviews.author: VICKY

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off, sturdy on ice.
customer_reviews.text: Saved me from slipping on ice. Easy on and off. Very sharp take off when walking on tile or inside floors. Fits right over my work boots.
customer_reviews.author: TRACKER

customer_reviews.title: A must have if u live and work in the Northern climates.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my son who is an over the road trucker working in North Dakota. He is extremely satisfied with the ice grips which are keeping him from falling when he outside of his rig.
customer_reviews.author: kappy70

customer_reviews.title: Tough but small.
customer_reviews.text: Work excellent and with heavy straps that should last but should be larger. In the winter we wear insulated boots so should have sizes to fit. This large size will only go on a small winter boot.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: They simply work!
customer_reviews.text: These feet chains work great. Flexible fit and stay on no matter how slippery or steep the terrain you are using them on. Highly recommend this product especially if you have slippery conditions. Will definitely keep you on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Alberico

customer_reviews.title: Great ice cleats!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a few other brands but these ice cleats have been the best. They are relatively easy to put on and remove and they work!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: No slip, no slide!
customer_reviews.text: In Wisconsin we get a lot of winter ice and snow, this makes taking my daily walk a breeze. No worries about slipping or sliding!
customer_reviews.author: W. Raffel

customer_reviews.title: Great for my area.
customer_reviews.text: Where I live black ice can appear in a blink of the eye. The Icetrack fits on all my shoe-ware , easy on easy off.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great traction...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried others that didn't fit good or would slip off, these fit both shoes and boots great and hold on secure. I've hiked many miles of icy roads with them...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Rayo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Use them for hikeing trails on snow and ice. Work great and stay on even with uneven ground. Bought these for my wife because I liked them so much. Her cleats kept falling off and we had to keep backtracking to find them.
customer_reviews.author: Rpbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Traction!!
customer_reviews.text: I own a horse farm and walking around in the fields can be downright treacherous this time of year. I have tried ice cleats in the past and these are the best. They stay very secure on my muck boots and I have not experienced any slipping or sliding under any surface conditions. I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Neal O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Good for winter hiking
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty great, I've been using them for mountain hiking and they work pretty well. I don't recommend using them for extreme ice climbing but winter hiking they are well suited for.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Nygard

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Function
customer_reviews.text: The product fits as expected and functions as advertised. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Mannel

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly how as described. Easy to put on any sneakers or boots. Great for icy conditions
customer_reviews.author: Moneymike

customer_reviews.title: No more slipping on the ice!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on ice - fits over shoes, boots and snow boots
customer_reviews.author: amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Not falling...😊
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and provide exceptional grip on icy surfaces
customer_reviews.author: JAMES J DIONNE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent traction, easy off and on
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Yactrax, which were difficult to get on and off and eventually just broke. I also didn't think the traction was terrific, and still needed to use poles. The Icetrax are far superior--no slippage on their maiden voyage on a slippery day. And I love the ease with which the rubber fits over boots or shoes. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Northeasterner

customer_reviews.title: Poor rubber material??
customer_reviews.text: Rubber Seam came apart while putting over shoes..........construction of sole appears good but was not able to use - I am returning them
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Donovon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly and greatly improved traction on icy driveways.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Quality product can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.text: I will be using these for fishing off the unpolished granite jetties of the Gulf Coast, to secure my footing against the slippery slime covered rocks. I will update my rating as soon as i get to try them out. By the way fitment is superb...👍 Put them onto my rubber/neoprene Aldi boots.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Casas

customer_reviews.title: I returned
customer_reviews.text: Ice cleats for over boots. I ordered x-large but didn’t fit still to small. Rubber on cleat tore the first time that I tried to put it on my boot. Very disappointed. Would not recommend purchasing this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: Well-made - secure fit
customer_reviews.text: These ice grips are well-made and fit securely. They provide excellent traction when walking on ice, eliminating the concern of slipping and falling.
customer_reviews.author: FMF

customer_reviews.title: Never slip again!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect! Our driveway is rather steep and shoveling can get rather treacherous. Once I put these on, I don't slip at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McCandless

customer_reviews.title: Traction support for older adults.
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed extra traction on snowy sidewalks as he uses a cane. These really help!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Lappin

customer_reviews.title: Stays on shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits shoe perfectly without needing a strap across the shoe. Won’t come off when walking in deep heavy snow like another brand did
customer_reviews.author: Craig G.

customer_reviews.title: They fit!  So far they're a 5 Star rated product.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried them outside yet, but they fit on my shoes/books.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. John A. Hales

customer_reviews.title: I work in the freezer all day long. These work well and I don’t slip
customer_reviews.text: I work in the freezer all day long. These work well and I don’t slip
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more slipping on the ice
customer_reviews.text: Worked great Kept me on my feet and doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing

customer_reviews.title: they work really well
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes this product, they fit well, they keep you standing on ice.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Snow tracs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to slip on and off. Give me the traction I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G.

product_meta.title: ICETRAX V3 Tungsten Winter Ice Grips for Shoes and Boots - Ice Cleats for Snow and Ice, StayON Toe, Reflective Heel
product_meta.description: Size:L/XL (Men: 9.5-13 / Women: 11+)Invest in your safety this winter with the new and improved ICETRAX V3 Pro Winter Ice Grips with 9 strategically placed ice cleats provide superior traction on snow and ice. Ideal for everyday use outdoor winter activities such as walking, running, hiking and working. Whether outdoors shoveling snow, walking the dog or running errands, the lightweight yet durable design of these traction cleats will give you the confidence you need when walking or running in icy and snowy winter conditions. The secure fitting design of the ice cleats incorporates a StayON toe cap which allows these ice cleats to adapt to the shape of your shoe, working with almost any style of shoe or boot. Added safety with built-in reflective heel for added night-time visibility and safety while walking or running in dark low visibility conditions. WARNING: Genuine ICETRAX products are made in Taiwan and sold on Amazon exclusively by TOPP Brands with fulfillment by Amazon. Other sellers claiming to offer ICETRAX products are not genuine, especially if they are shipping from China. We appreciate your understanding and support on this matter.
feature_bullets: NEW & IMPROVED TRACTION – Prevent slips and falls this winter with our new and improved ICETRAX V3 premium ice grips. Designed in Canada for harsh winter conditions, these ice grippers feature 9 strategically placed Tungsten Carbide ice cleat crampons combined with our proprietary snow tread traction system for maximum traction on ice and snow. ICETRAX ice cleats help you to walk, run and work more confidently in slippery winter conditions without worrying about slipping.

StayON SECURE FIT – Crampons with innovative StayON toe cap ensures a snug and secure fit on most types of footwear. The StayON toe cap design prevents the ice cleats from falling off or moving around while in use – no more worrying about whether or not your ice cleats have fallen off after just a few steps! Superior fitting ICETRAX V3 ice grippers ensures extra stability and safety for the user by securely staying in position on your shoes and boots.

EASY TO USE – ICETRAX traction cleats easily slip-on around most types of footwear in seconds. Simply place the toe cap of the traction aids over the front of your shoe/boot, then pull the heel of the grippers over the back of your shoe/boot. When not in use, the snow grips are lightweight and portable enough to be stored compactly.

NIGHT TIME SAFETY – Ice cleats for shoes and boots with built-in reflective heel for added night-time visibility and safety while walking or running in dark low visibility conditions. The unique reflective panels incorporated into the heels of the crampons help to reflect light from car headlights and streetlamps. Reflective heels add another layer of safety and make the ICETRAX traction aids perfect for people who enjoy walking or running in the early morning or evenings when it is dark out.

DURABLE – ICETRAX ice cleats are designed to endure heavy use throughout the cold winter months with durable reinforced joints and surfaces made with a special rubber compound which stays strong and retains elasticity in frigid cold temperatures.
